quests.title: Ship Geo Intel Dashboard V1
quests.desc: Ship dashboard containing multi-API insights, caching, and robust UX states.

quests.title: Complete and Post Portfolio V1
quests.desc: Create a personal portfolio to showcase projects and skills with personal creative touches.

quests.title: Upgrade Portfolio Systems
quests.desc: Add images/icon flavor, refine responsiveness, add more robust features. Verify and flesh out project sorting/filtering. Custom mouse pointer + scroll bar.

quests.title: Upgrade Geo Intel Dashboard
quests.desc: Add more widgets to fill out dashboard. Add other color themes. Improve UI/responsiveness when applicable.

quests.title: Build Auth & Roles Microservice V1
quests.desc: Design and implement a standalone authentication service with JWT, role-based access control, session tracking, and secure token workflows.

quests.title: Build Notification & Template Service V1
quests.desc: Create a reusable notification service supporting templated email delivery, async processing, retries, and idempotent sends.

quests.title: Build Media & Asset Service V1
quests.desc: Develop a secure media service for handling file uploads, metadata management, and pre-signed access URLs using an S3-compatible backend.

quests.title: Set Up Platform Infrastructure V1
quests.desc: Configure local infrastructure to orchestrate platform microservices, databases, caching, and object storage using Docker Compose.

quests.title: Set Up Shared Platform Container V1
quests.desc: Create a shared hub for all microservices to ensure consistency/reduce redundancy and enable scaling/testing/collaborative grouping.

projects.title: Geo Intel Dashboard
projects.desc: A polished dashboard combining widgets for countries, currency, weather, time, and insights.

projects.title: Auth & Roles Microservice
projects.desc: A standalone authentication and authorization microservice providing JWT-based auth, role-based access control, session tracking, and audit logging. Designed to integrate cleanly into future projects.

projects.title: Notification & Template Service
projects.desc: A reusable notification microservice supporting templated email delivery, retry logic, idempotent sends, and provider abstraction. Built to support authentication workflows, background jobs, and multi-application messaging needs.

projects.title: Media & Asset Service
projects.desc: A media management microservice handling secure file uploads, metadata tracking, and pre-signed access URLs using an S3-compatible backend.

projects.title: Platform Infrastructure & Local Orchestration
projects.desc: Infrastructure repository for local orchestration of platform microservices using Docker Compose. Manages service networking, databases, Redis, MinIO, and environment configuration for full-stack integration testing.

projects.title: Platform Shared Container
projects.desc: Shared foundation repository for a microservices-based platform. Acts as the single source of truth for API contracts, error semantics, and standards.
